# Extremely minimal information that MUST be filled out for each dataset
#
# Site_name: standard site name
# Longitude: decimal degrees; positive = east, negative = west
# Latitude: decimal degrees; positive = north, negative = south
# Elevation: elevation above sea level, meters
# UTC_offset: offset from UTC of site data, hours (standard time)
# IGBP: IGBP land cover type. Common types include:
#    Evergreen needleleaf forest
#    Evergreen broadleaf forest
#    Deciduous needleleaf forest
#    Deciduous broadleaf forest
#    Mixed forests
#    Closed shrubland
#    Open shrubland
#    Woody savanna
#    Savannas
#    Grassland
#    Wetland
#    Cropland
#    Urban
# Instrument: e.g. "LI-8100A/raw" for standard Licor setup, "LI-8100A/processed", others...
# Primary publication: DOI (preferred) or other primary publication that should
#     be cited when these data are used. Leave empty if unpublished.
# Other publications [optional]: comma-separated DOIs
# Acknowledgment [optional]: Acknowledgment (funding or other) text
# --------------------------------------
Site_name: 
Longitude: 
Latitude: 
Elevation: 
UTC_offset: 
IGBP: 
Instrument: LI-8100A/raw
Primary_pub: 
Other_pubs: 
Data_URL: 
Acknowledgment:
